Package in.definex.Action

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Checker.CheckerResetCallback
    Interface for checker action callback
    Checker.CheckerResultCallback
    interface used for checkerWithTimeout callback
    CompleteActionCallback
    CompleteActionCallback Callback Interface for action completion Created by adam_ on 30-11-2017.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    Action abstract action class to be implemented for new actions actions are actions that can be performed by the bot Created by adam_ on 30-11-2017.
    ActionManager
    ActionManager Manages the actions that can be performed by the bot When a new action is added to the actionManager, it puts it in back of the que, and it is performed when it gets in front of the que Created by adam_ on 30-11-2017.
    Checker
    Checker Special type of actions which are called when there are no actions in the action que Checkers are responsible for actions like checking new messages in active/inactive group(s) Created by adam_ on 05-12-2017.
    RemoteActionCall
    RemoteActionCall enables the bot to recognize and create Action object from string, The limitation of which being that all the parameters of Action to be created should have parameters only of type String, Integer, Float, or Boolean, if its not it should have a static method: Object castFromString(String s); which the RemoteActionCall uses to convert a string query to parameters object.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RemoteActionCall.Response
    Response enum, for getAction method
